name: CreateBatchCommercePayments
description:
Create a batch of commerce payments in HubSpot CRM.

This tool is used to create a batch of commerce payments in the HubSpot CRM system. It should be called when there's a need to process multiple payment entries at once.

parameters.name: commerce_payments_batch_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing an array of payment entries to process. Each entry requires specifics such as 'associations', 'objectWriteTraceId', and 'properties'.

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
